message.content:
cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the analysis of a Markov chain for polymer models, which is a topic in discrete mathematics and theoretical computer science. The paper also discusses the application of this Markov chain to the hard-core and ferromagnetic Potts models on expander graphs, which are topics in algorithms and complexity theory. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.CC (Computational Complexity). The paper also involves the use of information theory (cs.IT), machine learning (cs.LG), and social and information networks (cs.SI) in the analysis of the Markov chain, which makes these sub-categories likely as well.
